sentences.en: Bye! Drive carefully!
sentences.cn: 再见！开车小心！

sentences.en: Can you drive?
sentences.cn: 你会开车吗？

sentences.en: He drives (= has ) a BMW estate.
sentences.cn: 他开一辆宝马旅行车。

sentences.en: He drives 12 miles to work.
sentences.cn: 他驾车12英里去上班。

sentences.en: He was nearly three times over the drink drive limit.
sentences.cn: 他超过醉酒驾驶规定标准快三倍了。

sentences.en: I don't drive and the buses are quite hopeless.
sentences.cn: 我不开车，公共汽车条件又太糟糕。

sentences.en: I don't understand what you're driving at.
sentences.cn: 我不明白你的意思。

sentences.en: I don't understand what you're driving at.
sentences.cn: 我不明白您的意思

sentences.en: I used a sledgehammer to drive the pegs into the ground.
sentences.cn: 我用一把大锤子把短桩打进地里。

sentences.en: I'll drive you back to your hotel later. It's no bother.
sentences.cn: 我一会儿会开车把你送回宾馆，举手之劳。

sentences.en: It is a sensuous but demanding car to drive.
sentences.cn: 这车坐上去很舒服，但需要高超的驾驶技术。

sentences.en: John will be best remembered for his drive and enthusiasm.
sentences.cn: 约翰的魄力和热情最令人难忘。

sentences.en: Laura let out the clutch and pulled slowly away down the drive.
sentences.cn: 劳拉松开离合器踏板，沿车道慢慢驶离。

sentences.en: Matthew had no drive. He coasted along on his good looks.
sentences.cn: 马修没什么雄心大志，就凭着自己的长相混饭吃。

sentences.en: More than anything, I'd like to drive around the world.
sentences.cn: 我最想做的事是开车周游世界。

sentences.en: So when did you learn to drive ?
sentences.cn: 那么你是什么时候学会开车的？

sentences.en: Sometimes they just drive slowly down the lane enjoying the scenery.
sentences.cn: 有时他们只是沿着小路慢慢地开车，欣赏两旁的风景。

sentences.en: The drive required going down a quite twisty road.
sentences.cn: 开车的话需要走一段非常蜿蜒曲折的下坡路。

sentences.en: the man driving the car
sentences.cn: 开车的男子

sentences.en: The President had his plane waiting, 20 minutes' drive away.
sentences.cn: 总统让飞机在20分钟车程的地方等着。

sentences.en: There are certain things he does that drive me mad.
sentences.cn: 他的某些举动让我很生气。

sentences.en: They drive on the left-hand side of the road.
sentences.cn: 他们靠公路左边行驶。

sentences.en: Torrential rain drove the players off the course.
sentences.cn: 滂沱大雨迫使选手们离开了赛场。

sentences.en: We watched Dad drive the posts into the ground.
sentences.cn: 我们看着爸爸把木桩打入地里。

sentences.en: With a few loud whistles, they drove the donkeys out of the enclosure.
sentences.cn: 随着几声响亮的哨声，他们把驴子赶出了围栏。

sentences.en: You can store your entire CD collection on the computer's hard drive.
sentences.cn: 你可以将收藏的全部CD保存在电脑硬盘上。

words.tran_cn: 强劲的；推进的；精力旺盛的
驾驶员；驱动程序；起子；传动器
畜群；牛群、羊群等；移动的人群或大批的东西
把家畜赶到市集的人；家畜商人；牲畜贩子
[机]驱动器；驾车；[动][心理]内驱力，推进力；快车道

phrases.tran_cn: 驱动控制（等于horizontal drive control）
可以开上去的；继续开车
抬高；开车赶到；迫使…上升
电力传动；电力驱动装置
主传动；主驱动装置；肢动装置

trans.tran_cn: 驱车旅行，车道，大道，驱动，开球，强烈欲望，努力，驱赶

trans.tran_en: to make a car, truck, bus etc move along

trans.tran_cn: 驾驶（送人），推动，击打，（风等）吹，刮，驱逐，迫使
trans.tran_en: to force a person or animal to go somewhere
